attributes.action: Petition for Independent Inquiry into Child Sex and Grooming Gangs
attributes.additional_details: A respected organisation must lead this inquiry without ties to the government or police, involving human rights, child protection, and investigative journalism experts. We can only uncover hidden truths, hold those responsible accountable, and ensure justice for victims through rigorous investigation and collaboration. We must prioritise the protection of our children.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, demand a comprehensive and independent inquiry into the child sex and grooming gangs that have plagued the UK, along with the mass cover-up by authorities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
